Headline: Green Line Trains bypassing Cicer/Lake Station
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cicero/Lake due to standing water.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cicero/Lake due to standing water.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service from Pulaski/Lake to Laramie/Lake, in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
